RootTable.Filter:
SELECT aDomain.Name as 'Domain', TMF_Application.Name as 'TMF Application', HierarchyLevel.value as "Level", TMF_Application.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, TMF_Application.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, SortID.value as 'Sort ID', ApplicationIdentifier.Value as 'Application Identifier', Maturity.value as 'Maturity', TMFStatus.value as 'Status', TMF_Function.Name as TMF_Function, ParentApplication.Name as 'Parent App', TMF_Application.Note as 'Documentation', Issue.Notes as 'Issues' FROM t_object AS TMF_Application -- associated functions FULL OUTER JOIN t_connector as Applicationconnector ON (TMF_Application.Object_ID = Applicationconnector.Start_Object_ID AND Applicationconnector.Stereotype='TMF_ApplicationAssociatesFunction') FULL OUTER JOIN t_object AS TMF_Function ON (Applicationconnector.End_Object_ID = TMF_Function.Object_ID AND TMF_Function.Stereotype='TMF_Function' ) FULL OUTER JOIN t_connector as connector ON (TMF_Application.Object_ID = connector.Start_Object_ID AND connector.Stereotype='TMF_ApplicationComposedApplication') -- Parent application FULL OUTER JOIN t_connector as Parentconnector ON (TMF_Application.Object_ID = Parentconnector.Start_Object_ID AND Parentconnector.Stereotype='TMF_ApplicationComposedApplication') FULL OUTER JOIN t_object AS ParentApplication ON (Parentconnector.End_Object_ID = ParentApplication .Object_ID AND ParentApplication .Stereotype='TMF_Application')
-- Domain INNER JOIN t_connector as DomainConnector ON TMF_Application.Object_ID = DomainConnector.Start_Object_ID INNER JOIN t_object AS aDomain ON DomainConnector.End_Object_ID= aDomain.Object_ID
-- tagged values INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS ApplicationIdentifier ON (ApplicationIdentifier.Object_ID = TMF_Application.Object_ID AND ApplicationIdentifier.property = 'ApplicationIdentifier') INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS SortID ON (SortID.Object_ID = TMF_Application.Object_ID AND SortID.property = 'SortID') INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS HierarchyLevel ON (HierarchyLevel.Object_ID = TMF_Application.Object_ID AND HierarchyLevel.property = 'HierarchyLevel') INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS Maturity ON (Maturity.Object_ID = TMF_Application.Object_ID AND Maturity.property = 'Maturity') INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS TMFStatus ON (TMFStatus.Object_ID = TMF_Application.Object_ID AND TMFStatus.property = 'TMFStatus') INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS Issue ON (Issue.Object_ID = TMF_Application.Object_ID AND Issue.property = 'Issue')
WHERE TMF_Application.Stereotype='TMF_Application' AND aDomain.Stereotype='TMF_Domain' AND (DomainConnector.Stereotype='TMF_DomainAgreegatesApplication' OR DomainConnector.Stereotype='TMF_DomainAgregatesApplication')
AND ApplicationIdentifier.value LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'

SELECT o.name AS ItemName, o.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID , o.Object_Type AS [CLASSTYPE] FROM t_object AS o INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS isDeleted ON (isDeleted.Object_ID = o.Object_ID AND isDeleted.property = 'isDeleted' ) WHERE o.StereoType = 'TMF_Function' AND isDeleted.value='False' AND o.ea_guid not in ( Select o1.ea_guid from t_object as o1 Inner join t_connector c on (o1.Object_ID = c.Start_Object_ID AND (c.Stereotype = 'TMF_DomainAggregatesFunction' OR c.Stereotype = 'TMF_AFAAggregatesFunction')) inner join t_object o2 on (c.End_object_ID = o2.Object_ID AND o2.Stereotype = 'TMF_AF') WHERE o1.Stereotype = 'TMF_Function' )

SELECT aDomain.name as 'AF', anApplication.name as 'TAM Application', TMF_Function.Name as 'Function', SystemID.value as 'sys ID', FunctionID.value as 'Function ID', TMF_Function.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, TMF_Function.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE,
Maturity.value as 'Maturity', Origin.notes as 'Origin', Comment.notes as 'Comment', Issue.notes as 'Issue', aVertical.name as 'Vertical', TMF_Function.Note as 'Description' FROM t_object AS TMF_Function
-- Domain INNER JOIN t_connector as DomainConnector ON (TMF_Function.Object_ID = DomainConnector.Start_Object_ID AND DomainConnector.Stereotype = 'TMF_DomainAggregatesFunction') INNER JOIN t_object AS aDomain ON DomainConnector.End_Object_ID= aDomain.Object_ID
-- Vertical FULL Outer JOIN t_connector as VerticalConnector ON (TMF_Function.Object_ID = VerticalConnector.Start_Object_ID AND VerticalConnector.Stereotype = 'TMF_VerticalAggregatesFunction') FULL OUTER JOIN t_object AS aVertical ON VerticalConnector.End_Object_ID= aVertical.Object_ID
-- Application FULL Outer JOIN t_connector as AppliacationConnector ON (TMF_Function.Object_ID = AppliacationConnector.End_Object_ID AND AppliacationConnector.Stereotype = 'TMF_ApplicationAssociatesFunction') FULL OUTER JOIN t_object AS anApplication ON AppliacationConnector.Start_Object_ID= anApplication.Object_ID
-- Tagged Values INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS SystemID ON (SystemID.Object_ID = TMF_Function.Object_ID AND SystemID.property = 'System ID') INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS FunctionID ON (FunctionID.Object_ID = TMF_Function.Object_ID AND FunctionID.property = 'Function Identifier') INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS Maturity ON (Maturity.Object_ID = TMF_Function.Object_ID AND Maturity.property = 'Maturity') INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS Origin ON (Origin.Object_ID = TMF_Function.Object_ID AND Origin.property = 'Origin') INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS Comment ON (Comment.Object_ID = TMF_Function.Object_ID AND Comment.property = 'Comment') INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS Issue ON (Issue.Object_ID = TMF_Function.Object_ID AND Issue.property = 'Issue') INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS isDeleted ON (isDeleted.Object_ID = TMF_Function.Object_ID AND isDeleted.property = 'isDeleted' AND isDeleted.value='False') where FunctionID.value LIKE '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'

CAST(tid.value as int) as tid, mgroup.value as 'group', maturity.value as 'maturity', category1.value as 'category1', category2.value as 'category 2', category3.value as 'category 3', txtformula.value as 'text formula', busvalue.Notes as 'Business Value', units.value as 'units'
from ((((((((((((((t_object Metric
INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS units ON (units.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID and and units.property = 'units') INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS busvalue ON busvalue.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS txtformula ON txtformula.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS category3 ON category3.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS category2 ON category2.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS category1 ON category1.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS maturity ON maturity.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS mgroup ON mgroup.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS metrictype ON (metrictype.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID and AND metrictype.property='metrictype')) INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS tid ON (tid.Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID AND tid.property='tid'))
full join t_connector con on con.End_Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) full join t_object process on process.Object_ID = con.Start_Object_ID)
full join t_connector con2 on con2.Start_Object_ID = Metric.Object_ID) full join t_object ABE on ABE.Object_ID = con2.End_Object_ID) where Metric.Stereotype='TMF_Metric' and process.Stereotype='TMF_Process' and con.Stereotype= 'TMF_isMeasuredBy' and con2.Connector_Type='Dependency' AND ABE.Stereotype='TMF_ABE'
AND mgroup.property='group' AND maturity.property='maturity' and category1.property = 'category1' and category2.property = 'category2' and category3.property = 'category3' and txtformula.property = 'txtformula' and busvalue.property = 'busvalue'

SELECT ApplicationComponent.Name as ApplicationComponent, ApplicationFunction.Name as 'Function', ApplicationFunction.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, ApplicationFunction.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, ApplicationFunction.Note as description FROM t_object AS ApplicationComponent INNER JOIN t_connector as connector ON ApplicationComponent.Object_ID = connector.End_Object_ID INNER JOIN t_object AS ApplicationFunction ON connector.Start_Object_ID = ApplicationFunction.Object_ID WHERE ApplicationComponent.Stereotype='dApplicationComponent' AND ApplicationFunction.Stereotype='dApplicationFunction' AND connector.Stereotype='dApplicationAgregatesFunction' order by ApplicationComponent.name ASC

Select o1.name as 'component', o1.note as 'description', o2.name as 'function', o2.note as 'specification' from ((t_object as o1
Inner join t_connector c on o1.Object_ID = c.End_object_ID) inner join t_object o2 on c.Start_Object_ID = o2.Object_ID)
WHERE o2.Stereotype = 'dApplicationFunction' AND o1.Stereotype = 'dApplicationComponent' AND c.Stereotype = 'dApplicationAgregatesFunction'
order by o1.name ASC

SELECT aDomain.name as 'AF', aDomain.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, aDomain.Object_Type AS [CLASSTYPE] FROM t_object AS aDomain
-- Tagged Values INNER JOIN t_objectproperties AS HierarchyLevel ON (HierarchyLevel.Object_ID = aDomain.Object_ID AND HierarchyLevel.property = 'HierarchyLevel')
WHERE aDomain.Stereotype = 'TMF_AF' AND HierarchyLevel.value = '2'
